entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
